Row.Text: Young Plachta learned alchemy to save her hometown from a severe drought. With the crisis ended, she kept her research day and night to further use alchemy for good deeds. Plachta then had to confront Luard, once her childhood friend, and turn herself into a mysterious book to stop him exhausting the power of nature. After hundreds of years, the book became a good teacher and friend of Sophie Neuenmuller, another alchemist, who finally helped her regain a human form.
